title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-4.3 - Form DH-Land Record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-4.3 - Form DH-Land Record

State Regulations

The local agency shall maintain a current card record
of each parcel of land acquired or to be acquired by private purchase or
condemnation on form DH-Land Record, a specimen form of which is shown as

Exhibit 10 of Appendix S-11. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1646-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
